title: False exhibits
context: ยง431:4-121 False exhibits. Every person who, with intent to deceive knowingly exhibits any false account, document or advertisement, relative to the affairs of any insurer, or of any corporation of the kind enumerated in section 431:4-107, formed or proposed to be formed, is punishable in accordance with section 431:2-203. [L 1987, c 347, pt of ยง2]
